Posted By: SolaceVerisi (5/12/2011 1:09:04 PM)

posts.post_content:
@Khavrion, you seriously need to go back to magic school. Paying life is not the same as taking damage, it can't be prevented. I'm so glad I am not in your playgroup.  
  
I love running this with [Pestilence](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Pestilence) in EDH. Get to pick and choose which players take it and which don't. (There are a million ways to keep this creature safe from the pestilence, not going to bring them up here.) Also, slap a [Followed Footsteps](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Followed Footsteps) on this sucker, and every turn you can prevent more and more damage. Having a wall of clerics on the board that pretty much make you immune to damage, as well as the politics they allow in an EDH deck can be a lot of fun.

posts.post_content: Man as soon as you slap this badboy down in a cleric deck, your opponent might as well scoop because its game over. This card frees up the clerics that you tied down (or should have) to be ready to use [master apothecary](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=master apothecary). So slap it down, pro your [doubtless one](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=doubtless one) or [scion of darkness](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=scion of darkness) with [mother of runes](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=mother of runes) , sac for [Starlit sanctum](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Starlit sanctum) for that last bit of life and GG.
posts.html:
Man as soon as you slap this badboy down in a cleric deck, your opponent might as well scoop because its game over. This card frees up the clerics that you tied down (or should have) to be ready to use master apothecary. So slap it down, pro your doubtless one or scion of darkness with mother of runes , sac for Starlit sanctum for that last bit of life and GG.

posts.post_content: Guys, totally: this with any of the Phyrexian mana symbol cards. With her out, you automatically take only 1 damage. With another cleric, you can cast any of that for free. [Immolating Souleater](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Immolating Souleater) just became an infinity/1. And [Moltensteel Dragon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Moltensteel Dragon) became a 4 drop, for a 4/4 with flying and infinite firebreathing.
